name: Mangayomi
subtitle: An experience like no other.
description:
This is the official source for Mangayomi.

For full details, check the GitHub repository:
https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi

apps.name: Mangayomi
apps.subtitle: Read manga, novels, and watch anime
apps.localizedDescription: Mangayomi is an open-source Flutter app for reading manga, novels, and watching anime across multiple platforms.

versions.localizedDescription:
* Increase isolate pool size to enhance concurrent download capabilities

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/compare/v0.6.95...v0.7.0

What's Changed
* Fix "Show extensions" Button AND Fix category rearrange bug AND hide ItemType from calendar by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/636
* Add a force landscape mode on mobile by @686udjie in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/638
* Fix 637: Importing .epub doesn’t work
* Enhance category management with animation
* Refactor download management with shared isolate pool and optimize concurrent downloads

New Contributors
* @686udjie made their first contribution in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/638

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/compare/v0.6.90...v0.6.95

What's Changed
* Add log switch to about•menu by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/629
* Path optimizations by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/632
* fix: show chanded source preference for mihon source
* Chapter jump fix in vertical continuous mode
* some fixes


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/compare/v0.6.85...v0.6.90

What's Changed
* Integrate MExtensionServer for Android
* Android no longer needs the APKBridge server.
* fix: updated statistics to use async fetch from db by @Whiskas101 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/618
* Add new feature: Always On Top on the anime player view. by @hndrbrm in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/614
* AppImage Fix by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/624
* Add default user agent setting
* Refactor reader page view and logic


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/compare/v0.6.80...v0.6.85

• fix video showing blue blank screen

What's Changed
* Fix: Reverse icon for toggling the Extension. by @hndrbrm in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/610
* Various fixes by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/612
* Fix 613 video player showing blue blank screen
* Fix app crash when watching anime

New Contributors
* @hndrbrm made their first contribution in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/610

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/compare/v0.6.75...v0.6.80

What's Changed
* Fix memory leaks in manga reader_view.dart by @Whiskas101 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/605
* Refactor: remove old layout migration code
* Fix 604 can't restore backup on macos 
* Refactor: replace await for loop with listen for message handling in isolate
* Fix CF auto resolution not working

New Contributors
* @Whiskas101 made their first contribution in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/605

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/compare/v0.6.70...v0.6.75

* fix: update directory handling for macOS
* fix: enable the use of the logger in the isolated service so that logs are printed in the code editor
* fix: improve layout and styling in entry detail 

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/compare/v0.6.65...v0.6.70

* Fix 601 Format Exception: Missing extension byte (at offset 14740452)
* Fix auto backup not working
* Some optimisations

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/compare/v0.6.60...v0.6.65

What's Changed
* iOS Workflow fix by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/573
* fixed trakt episode numbers by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/575
* reworked local source by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/574
* added support for LNReader plugins by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/587
* fixed migration sourceId issue by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/594
* Refactor and update dependencies for Isar and Riverpod by @kodjodevf in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/596
* Standardize Folder Structure on Windows, Linux, iOS & macOS by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/517
* Some optimisations


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/compare/v0.6.5...v0.6.60

What's Changed
* Show correct version number on Windows by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/542
* re•added full upload and download by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/544
* Fix MAL & Kitsu "No Cover" Exception by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/555
* allow to swipe pages even if zoomed in by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/553
* added Anibrain recommendations by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/552
* move history to more screen if hidden by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/549
* added downloaded only mode by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/551
* added quick access to source settings by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/550
* added missing arb entry by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/556
* Refactor select bar widget and unify manga read state logic by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/536
* enhanced mpv player by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/540
* added support for Mihon extensions via ApkBridge by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/559
* fixed local subtitles by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/565
* enhanced calendar by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/564
* added subtitles search by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/560
* added watch order by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/562
* changed from labels to icons by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/566
* added Simkl tracker by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/561
* add option to download online subtitles by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/567
* fixed Trakt refresh token by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/569
* added button link to the apk by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/570
* added option to turn on/off mpv hardware acceleration by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/571


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/compare/v0.6.35...v0.6.5

What's Changed
* Fix versioning and packaging issues for Windows and Linux builds; improve packaging consistency by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/515
* Save lastPageRead before system kills app by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/521
* Fix Exception by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/516
* Use icons from macOS folder for linux builds by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/524
* Properly dispose by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/519
* Enhance Performance of Updates and History Screen by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/525
* Improved UX for Migration, Anime Playback & Navigation by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/520
* added support for local epubs and displaying its images by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/527
* added discord rpc by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/526
* added sync for settings by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/528
* No discordRPC for iOS and Android by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/533
* Reduce file size of AppImage by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/532
* Fix regression: restore fullscreen exit logic on desktop by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/531
* Fix MyAnimeList Token Refresh by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/534
* Update manga to display correct number of unread chapters after marking chapters as read/unread by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/535
* Fix AnyhowException (DiscordRPC) when restoring a backup by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/537
* Added Hindi & Assamese Translations by @itsmechinmoy in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/538

New Contributors
* @itsmechinmoy made their first contribution in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/538

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/compare/v0.6.3...v0.6.35

What's Changed
* added option to change hwdec by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/483
* Fixes, Refactors, and Async Improvements by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/484
* Fix Async Transaction Bug and Category Management Issues by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/489
* Create PKGBUILD for Arch linux by @saberr26 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/485
* added two•way•tracking by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/490
* Refactor: Consolidate _openCategory() Methods into Unified Dialog by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/491
* Release file lock by closing InputStream by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/493
* increased protobuf limit to 250 MB by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/494
* Make buttons white for consistency in light mode by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/496
* improved two•way track screen by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/497
* Don't allow zooming by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/502
* adjusted tracker library + bug fixes by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/501
* iOS CBZ import fix by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/503
* 🎬 Improve Fullscreen Stability & Simplify AniSkip Logic by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/499
* added option to disable merged library navigation by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/504
* reworked sync server by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/506
* Fix "Read" and "Unread" button [based on PR 506] by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/507
* Fix labels on navigation bar [based on PR 506] by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/508
* Refactor code  by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/509
* Fix menu colors on theme change by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/511
* Fix delete "Downloaded episodes/chapters" by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/512
* Add tracker button to localArchive by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/513
* Changed the "Page preload amount" Setting to be a Slider by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/510

New Contributors
* @saberr26 made their first contribution in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/485

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/compare/v0.6.25...v0.6.3

What's Changed
* Improve Detail View Categories, Add Update Switch, Fix Navigation Exception by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/477
* fix file path handling
* Fix indexing and path for downloaded chapter images and update padding logic

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/compare/v0.6.2...v0.6.25

What's Changed
• Fix inspector/crash issues & improve UX in extension, player, and UI by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/469
• Apply System Theme After Backup Restore by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/471
• Fix [Chapters not marked as finished with vertical continuous](https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/issues/474)
• Fix [Leaving an extension in Browse resets to 1st tab](https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/issues/468)
• Fix [Grey screen when accessing settings of dart extensions](https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/issues/467)
• Fix ["Cancel" Button on Update Window Does Nothing](https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/issues/466)
• Some optimisations



**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/compare/v0.6.1...v0.6.2

What's Changed
* image path fix by @tanakrit•d in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/431
* Apply Correct System Theme After Restart + Localized messages are generated into source by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/432
* Clean up code + Add keyboard shortcut + Fix CBZ Archive by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/436
* Fix 444 + Kitsu detail change + episode/chapter name marquee effect by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/445
* Refactor code, fix AniList/MAL bugs, add local scan (148, 349) by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/446
* added support for epubs by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/449
* migrate to d4rt package by @kodjodevf in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/450
* refactor: update AndroidManifest and MainActivity for APK installatio… by @kodjodevf in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/451
* added JSON structure check for repos by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/455
* Improve Video Playback UI & Maintainability by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/457
* Update storage_provider.dart by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/462
* Fix Kitsu by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/463
* Refactor reader view by @kodjodevf in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/465


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/compare/v0.6.0...v0.6.1

What's Changed
* added options to migrate sources and clean the database by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/400
* added default subtitle lang + statistics screen by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/409
* Only on wifi (+ ethernet) by @NBA2K1 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/416
* added support for Kotatsu and Mihon backups by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/413
* added option to load own subtitles by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/421
* added follow system theme + screenshot in player view by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/423
* fixed restore archive bug by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/426
* android users now can directly install new updates by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/427
* add ipa signing; integrate repo; add entitlements by @tanakrit•d in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/418
* feat: add new localization strings for multiple languages
* improve category
* fix lag when installing extension
* minor fixes

New Contributors
* @tanakrit•d made their first contribution in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/418

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/compare/v0.5.2...v0.6.0

What's Changed
* Update quarkuc extractor  by @yxxyun in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/393
* added long press for 2x playback speed by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/396
* fix broken category 
* add confirmation dialog for adding repositories


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/compare/v0.5.1...v0.5.2

What's Changed
* added deep links for repo urls by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/379
* enhanced sync feature by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/380
* optimized sync and bug fixes by @Schnitzel5 in https://github.com/kodjodevf/mangayomi/pull/381

• improve custom navigation settings
• remove embedded URLs from extensions
